contents.text: Welcome to BuildingConnected, the San Francisco platform that top builders trust to simplify preconstruction.
For preconstruction bidding and project invitations, press 1.
To learn how to submit a new bid, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our bidding specialists.

navigationGoals: Walk me through placing a new preconstruction bid.
I need to submit a new bid for an upcoming preconstruction project as a veteran-owned contractor.
I need to upload and submit a detailed bid package, including my cost breakdown, for a new preconstruction project.
I need help submitting a new bid for a project.
Could you walk me through submitting a new bid on the platform?

contents.text: To manage your project invitations, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our invitations team.

navigationGoals: I need to update and manage my project invitations.
I want to review and manage the project invitations I’ve received for upcoming bids.
I want to manage and resend pending project invitations to subcontractors in my current bidding pipeline.
I want to review and respond to my project invitations.
I need to review and respond to my project invitations.

contents.text: For account management and technical support, press 2.
For billing and subscription questions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Confirm my subscription details and update my payment method.
I need help updating my billing information and reviewing my subscription plan.
I need to update my payment method and review my monthly subscription invoice for my BuildingConnected account.
I need help understanding my latest invoice and updating my payment method.
I want to update my payment method and check my subscription charges.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue with my account dashboard.
I’m having technical issues accessing my account and need troubleshooting assistance.
I'm getting an API authentication error when pulling project data via your REST API and need help troubleshooting.
I'm having trouble logging in; please help me access my account.
I'm having trouble accessing my account and need technical support.
